description: Pre-identified expert head indices from RHI analysis on XD-Violence dataset using InternVL3-8B
paper_reference: HeadHunt-VAD: Hunting Robust Anomaly-Sensitive Heads in MLLM for Tuning-Free Video Anomaly Detection
note: These are example head indices. For best results, run RHI on your own data using scripts/run_rhi.py
